name: krossed-dating-app
description: A proximity-based dating app that encourages real-world connections over digital communication. Features location-based matching, 72-hour countdown system, and comprehensive safety tools.

ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: 32-byte encryption key for sensitive data (generate with: openssl rand -hex 32)

JWT_SECRET.description: Secret key for JWT token signing (generate with: openssl rand -base64 32)

SESSION_SECRET.description: Secret for session management (generate with: openssl rand -base64 32)

STRIPE_SECRET_KEY.description: Stripe secret key for payment processing (starts with sk_)

SENDGRID_API_KEY.description: SendGrid API key for email notifications

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: Twilio Account SID for SMS notifications

TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Twilio Auth Token for SMS notifications

TWILIO_PHONE_NUMBER.description: Twilio phone number for SMS notifications

REPLIT_DOMAINS.description: Comma-separated list of allowed domains for CORS

ISSUER_URL.description: OpenID Connect issuer URL for authentication

REPL_ID.description: Replit application ID for OpenID Connect
